turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Sunpyre.
turn.1: What was the second X-Men film about?
turn.2: This time she was removed from the front lines and instead spent most of her time in the laboratory studying the mutant Abyss.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: No explanation was provided for the fifteen-year-old's sudden expertise in mutant genetics.
turn.5: What happen in the end of the film?
turn.6: When Mystique, who had infiltrated the group and brought together the other former villains, began her plan for taking over the X-Corps, Sunpyre was one of the casualties.
turn.10: When Banshee finds her corpse, he is also stabbed but he survives his wounds.
turn.12: Mystique had wanted to release Abyss, but she got more than she bargained for when the mutant was unable to turn off his powers and sucked the shapeshifter into the dimensional void in his chest cavity.
